annotation_sentence: The testing part, I think. We need more, um, time to make sure everything working good.
rationale: The phrase 'everything working' lacks number agreement. It should be 'everything is working' to agree with the singular subject 'everything'.

annotation_sentence: Um, no, I think that is all. I will focus on testing and, uh, tell if more problem.
rationale: The phrase 'more problem' lacks number agreement. It should be 'more problems' to agree with the plural context.
